description: Single room available for a student in a shared apartment. Prime location near G-11 Markaz with all utilities accessible. Ideal for NUST or FAST students.
Two rooms available in a spacious house in Model Town. Fully furnished with a peaceful environment for studying. Suitable for LUMS or UCP students.
A single room in a well-maintained apartment complex. Close to universities and markets. No load shedding issues due to standby generator.
Hostel accommodation for a female student in I-8. Secure and friendly environment with all necessary amenities. Very close to public transport.
Economical room for rent in a family-run guest house. Clean and simple. Perfect for students on a tight budget. Near Emporium Mall.
Two-room portion available in a beautiful DHA house. Separate entrance ensures privacy. All modern amenities included. Ideal for IBA or CBM students.
Fully furnished room with a view of the Margalla Hills. Quiet and serene location perfect for studies. All bills included in the rent.
One room available for a student in a shared flat. Gated community with good security. Very reasonable rent for the area.
A very cheap room with an attached kitchenette. Good for a single student who prefers to cook. This is a very low price, be careful.
Student hostel room near 6th Road metro station. Easy commute to Islamabad universities. All facilities available. Mess is optional.
